Package main

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BetterClone<MetaType,Self extends BetterClone<MetaType,Self>>
    Cloneable doesn't work.
    Curve
    A curve, a function, or anything else that maps one x value to one y value
    Destructable
    Basically every class that needs a finalizer and doesn't want to trust the garbage collector
    Player
    Real time audio player
    Synthesizer
    Generic synthesizer interface, shared with Java and Python
    Used in tandem with patterns to generate voices which may rely on the synthesizer
    TLCParent
    Dummy interface which both TrackLayerCompound and Composition implement, since they can both be parents of a TLC
    Track
    Any audio track
    TransformableCurve<T extends Curve>
    A curve that can be transformed
    For each, return a new curve object which should mirror as closely as possible the curve after a transformation
    Accuracy depends on implementation, user should be aware and know what objects they are dealing with
    TransientContainer<T>
    All objects with transient fields that need to be initialized when the program starts or whenever they get deserialized/loaded
    Voice
    A voice, used by audio tracks
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCurve
    Extension of Curve with some useful methods added
    Composition
    An actual composition, the parent of everything else
    Main
    The main class.
    MetaComponent<T extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    JComponent holder with additional metadata to help the program
    MetaSamples
    Same thing as Samples but with some other useful metadata as well as variables scripts can use
    Pattern
    A standard pattern containing clips
    PlayerDoubleBuffer
    An implementation of the Player interface which uses a double buffer to allow for continuous audio playback
    Samples
    Sampled sound
    Session  
    TrackLayerCompound
    Contains tracks
    A new blank MetaSamples object is created, all tracks process that, and that object is finally layered onto the given one
    TrackLayerSimple
    Contains patterns
